text: Investing.com is a notable financial website. It provides financial news as well as information about market "quotes", foreign exchange, stocks, commodities, currencies, interest rates and more. As of December 2020, it is the second most popular financial website in the world and is among the top 200 most popular websites overall. The website was founded in 2007 as "Forexpros". In 2012 its name changed to Investing.com, after the company bought their (domain) name for $2.45 million.Huhman, Heather, Forexpros.com Buys Investing.com for Whopping $2.45 Million, HuffPostHeather R. Huhman Investing.com Domain Purchased for an Historic $2.45 Million Businessinsider.com In the years 2013-2014, Investing.com launched Android and iOS apps, and in 2019 had editions in 24 languages. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Websites established in 2007 Category:Financial companies Category:Spanish websites
title: Investing.com
